rules_text:
Whenever a nontoken creature dies, create a 1/1 black Skeleton creature token with menace.
{G}{W}: Untap target creature an opponent controls. That creature blocks Ibaraki-Douji this turn if able.
[i](Melds with Kasen, Seeking Herself)[/i]
special_text2:
[-1]: Exile target permanent.
[-13]: Target opponent chooses up to one creature they control, then sacrifices all other nonland permanents they control.
